name: WhiteWolf Forums - Alternate Style
description:
I found the new forums ( as of 2011 - 2 - 10 ) to be to bright to my liking and disliked its fixed with elements as well. This style attempts to fix it up a little.

- Forums use full browser width, this may not looks as nice on every resolution, sorry.
- No more hot-pink highlighting, now its just boring blue
- Colours set to a white/blue on black, colour scheme was adopted from GryMor's post here: http://forums.white-wolf.com/default.aspx?g=posts&m=929580#post929580

Known Issues
- Stretched header and footer misalign and look ugly
- Images for quote, thank, etc do not look very nice in this style

I'm not a designer I just adopted GryMor's work and added some additional changes, if you dislike it its probably because I suck at this.
additional_info:
First release, additional changes may come.

Second release
 - Increased fontsize for most text to 12px, 2 points larger then before.
 - Tweaked a large amount of things to fix problems with dark font on dark background issues
 - Tweaked the bbcode input buttons to have a grey background, transparent buttons should now have proper contrast with the background.
 - Tweaked post input box to be white on grey
 - Tweaked quick-post input to be white on grey
 - Enforced a black background on the missing columns in my topics, no more glaring white boxes there

Third Release
 - Fixed a new issue with a white border appearing around the style now that WhiteWolf has adapted the original style somewhat.

Third Release
 - "Fixed" Dem's colour usage. All use of the Blue colour in Spans is changed to the Link blue.

Fourth Release
 - Fixed a problem on firefox 3.6 and/or linux
